Title: Behind the Candelabra
Writer: Richard LaGravenese (screenplay), Scott Thorson (book), Alex Thorleifson (book)
Actors: Matt Damon, Scott Bakula, Eric Zuckerman, Eddie Jemison
Plot: A chronicle of the tempestuous six year romance between megastar singer, Liberace, and his young lover, Scott Thorson.
Awards: Won 2 Golden Globes. Another 41 wins & 48 nominations.
